com.faltro.houdoku.util

Interface InfoSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AniList, GenericInfoSource

    public interface InfoSource
    An info source is a website which contains generic series information and media. This type differs from ContentSource in that instances of this class are used to retrieve information and media which is not specific to an individual ContentSource.

    Currently, instances of this class are not heavily utilized, since most ContentSource's provide adequate series information. In the future, we may want to utilize instances of this class to "fill in" for missing data from ContentSource's.

    The client maintains only one InfoSource at a time, which is hardcoded in PluginManager. In the future, we may allow the user to switch the current InfoSource in their settings.

    See Also:
    com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.info

        Retrieve a banner image for a series.
